topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bcb6c963687252af1f0300#post_54bcb6c963687252af1f0300
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bcb599636872512b7b0400#post_54bcb599636872512b7b0400
Uc. I love you, but the fact that you think means you know nothing about Eva.[/bq]
Every argument about the plot of Evangelion summarized in a single image:
!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/779/015/e91.png!

No offense to any eva fans, *BUT EVANGELION IS NOT THE ONLY SCIENCE FICTION FRANCHISE WHERE HUMAN LIFE IS STARTED BY ALIENS FOR FUCKS SAKES!* . . . Seriously guys. . . If we were to list every science fiction franchise featuring emotionally broken individuals and pseudo religious iconography we'd be here all god damn month guys trying to list all them.  One of my shelfs of dvds is specifically dedicated to this genre.

The whole "you don't understand evangelion" thing eva fans fall back to is pretentious cause that would be like someone saying a specific franchise owns all of time travel and anyone who says that they understand time travel in science fiction must "obviously doesn't understand time travel cause it's 2deep4u".  That'd be like saying the parallel universe trope in science fiction is "2deep4u".  That'd be like saying robot uprisings in science fiction is "2deep4u".
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
